a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

div.label: Search Our Site

div.h2: To Build and Sustain a Legacy of Lifelong Learning!

div.script: var photoGallery196= {"Album": {"title":"960px X 460px Gallery","description":"","transitiondelay":"5","fadestyle":"NO","gallerywidth":"960","backgroundaudio":"/cms/lib/WA02217158/Centricity/ModuleInstance/195/","loopaudio":"False","lgpath":"/cms/lib/WA02217158/Centricity/ModuleInstance/195/large/","tnpath":"/cms/lib/WA02217158/Centricity/ModuleInstance/195/thumbs/","Images": [{"photoname":"Opening Ceremony","src":"Opening Ceremony.jpg?rnd=0.207068954690857","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"}]}}

p.strong: Elementary School Middle School High School

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.h3: BRIDGEPORT HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS: Please pick up your school work at the high school commons Monday, April 20th – Friday, April 24th 8:00AM – 2:00PM. Line up outside the front doors of the high school six feet apart. We will be social distancing. This work is required to earn credit in your high school classes.

ESTUDIANTES DE LA PREPARATORIA DE BRIDGEPORT: Por favor, obtengan su trabajo escolar en la cafetería de la preparatoria el lunes 20 de abril al viernes 24 de abril de las 8:00am a las 2:00pm. Deben alinearse afuera de las puertas principales de la escuela secundaria a seis pies de distancia. Tendremos distanciamiento social. Este trabajo es necesario para obtener crédito en sus clases de la preparatoria.
span.p: The elementary school will be distributing work packets to students on Tuesday, April 14. Students can pick their work up when getting their meals at the school, or when they are getting their meals from the bus. The packets will include 3 weeks of work. The collection of these packets will begin on the week of April 20.
span.h2: PADRES/TUTORES DE ESTUDIANTES QUE ASISTEN A LA PRIMARIA
span.p: La escuela primaria distribuirá paquetes de trabajo a los estudiantes el martes 14 de abril. Los estudiantes pueden recoger su trabajo cuando reciben sus comidas en la escuela o cuando reciben sus comidas del autobús. Los paquetes incluirán 3 semanas de trabajo. La recolección de estos paquetes comenzará en la semana del 20 de abril.

span.strong: MEAL SCHEDULE UPDATE | ACTUALIZACIÓN DEL PROGRAMA DE COMIDAS 04/02/2020

div.strong: The meal program will not be available during spring break, April 6-10. It will resume Monday, April 13.

br.strong: El programa de comidas no estará disponible durante las vacaciones de primavera, del 6 al 10 de abril. Se reanudará el lunes 13 de abril.

span.div: In an effort to limit exposure, effective Thursday, March 26, we will have one meal pickup and delivery per day. Afternoon schedule remains the same: Elementary: 11:30 – 12:30 pm; Delivery: 11:00 – 11:30. This meal pickup and delivery will include both breakfast and lunch.

En un esfuerzo por limitar la exposición, a partir del jueves 26 de marzo, tendremos una entrega de comida por día. El horario de la tarde sigue siendo el mismo: La primaria: 11:30 - 12:30 pm; Entrega en bus: 11:00 - 11:30. Esta entrega de comida incluirá desayuno y almuerzo.

a.title: Go to comments for Update | Actualizacion

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Newsletter Graphic

ol.li: Ensure a school culture where every student is respected, safe, academically challenged and engaged.
Ensure rigorous and relevant learning opportunities.
Ensure high quality and effective personnel in all positions.
Ensure strong partnerships with students, families, and community.
Ensure district resources support the strategic plan.

span.p: The next regularly scheduled school board meeting is March 30, 2020 6:00 pm, Middle School Commons.
Career Fairs are starting is just a few weeks. If you plan to retire or move on to another district in the upcoming school year, please let your principal know as soon as possible.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: BORDER

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

span.p: The Middle School and Elementary School will be completed and turned over to the district right around the start of the New Year. The High School will be complete mid-January with the final touches being put together in the kitchen. Landscaping and parking lots will be completed this spring once warmer weather arrives. We have received notice from OSPI that we have received the Urgent Repair grant to remodel the High School office and front entryway. This work will take place later this school year. The staff and students are excited to move into their new space.

span.strong: PARENT U was created to help guide parents through their child's developmental years while at school so that they can be well informed and prepared on how to answer their child's questions about school experiences and support them with their safety and health while in school.

span.style: text-decoration: underline; font-size: medium; color: darkorange;

span.strong: To access the videos, please contact the District Office at 509-686-5656
